# textureCoordinates

**Instance Property**

An array of texture coordinate values for each point in the plane mesh.

## Declaration

```swift
@nonobjc var textureCoordinates: [vector_float2] { get }
```

## Discussion

Each `float2` value in this array represents the UV texture coordinates for the vertex at the corresponding index in the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARPlaneGeometry/vertices-43kle] array.

## Accessing Mesh Data

- **vertices**: An array of vertex positions for each point in the plane mesh.
- **triangleCount**: The number of triangles described by the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARPlaneGeometry/triangleIndices-1azi3] buffer.
- **triangleIndices**: An array of indices describing the triangle mesh formed by the plane geometry’s vertex data.
